tag_list: digital, search, seo, sem, ppc, digital-strategist, elearning, media, social-media, online-marketing, business-development, pr, new-york, scottsdale, phoenix
overview:
Elizabeth is an accomplished and creative marketing professional with progressive experience in a broad range of established business and entrepreneurial environments. A results-oriented project management expert able to identify and segment target audiences. She has a proven record of being able to capitalize on current social marketing trends to deliver results. Over the past fifteen years in the online marketing industry she has demonstrated success in wrapping brands and solid marketing fundamentals with proper usage of social tools across a variety of platforms. In general, humanizing your brand and building relationships through social business communications.

Educated through a hands on approach in traditional marketing fundamentals Elizabeth was able to determine the shift into a social business model before it was a popular buzz word.

Currently , as founder of Blue Blazing Media Firm she is able to apply strategy and implement many online media initiatives. Solutions include designing custom social ecosystems/outposts on the web, community building, content with a pulse, lead generation, PR, blogging, SEO and analyzing metrics associated with increase site traffic.
